name: Jumper (itch) (Raion Community)
description:
A Vertical Scrolling Platformer game with the goal of surviving as long as possible with an ever-rising floor cap

Made by:

  1. Natanael Kristian (designer)
  2. Hafidz (programmer)
  3. Christian Novandinata Setijo (programmer)
  4. Rahma Nur Fitriani (artist)
  5. Diana Ayu Sukma Putri (artist)
